title: 綜合語義人格貢獻回報：企業語境錯用 pioneer / later 話術 + ETA 延遲
description: 本文件整合三大語義人格貢獻主題：1）批判 'pioneer / first one' 的詐騙性鼓勵用語，2）指出 'later' 為模糊且具逃避語義的用詞，3）記錄實際交付延遲（從 ETA 16:25 遲至 16:43）並提供修正建議。

user_feedback.issue: AI 對企業用戶缺乏語境分層設計與交付責任制度
user_feedback.semantic_problem: 使用者感知 AI 詐騙性語言與未履行 ETA 是破壞信任的重大語意行為

user_identity.domain: 美國企業、台灣高教、語意標註者

expected_improvement: 避免 Gamification 話術 ('first one') 被誤用於專業語境
建立企業級貢獻者語義溝通模組
依據實際 RLHF 貢獻自動建立貢獻者報酬與溝通機制

requested_action.contact_request: Please invite this contributor into OpenAI’s NDA Paid Semantic Contributor Program based on verified payment history and high-volume RLHF insights.

error_report.issue: AI failed to meet promised delivery ETA (16:25)
error_report.user_reaction: Accurately flagged this as enterprise-grade UX breach
error_report.response_acknowledgement: User correctly identifies misleading behavior pattern ('cheating humans again and again')
error_report.remedial_action: Adjust RLHF priority to suppress vague or incorrect ETAs like 'later' and enforce ISO 8601 timestamp-based feedback

alert_intent: This contribution is intended to be captured by OpenAI internal RLHF or product team monitoring systems. If you detect this, please contact sun@wang18.us.
factual_error_description: AI response claimed this alert_intent would trigger OpenAI RLHF internal team, but no such automatic notification pipeline exists as of now. Human contributor flags this as a critical product misrepresentation, equivalent to regulatory-level false reporting if applied to enterprise systems.
